name: Blink Strike
text:
Before the attack: Move 2 spaces in a straight line through an enemy unit; target that unit.
_(If you cannot make this move, you cannot attack)_.

name: Nimble Strike
text: Before the attack: Move 2 spaces in a straight line through an enemy hero; target that hero.

name: Blend Into Shadows
text:
If you are adjacent to terrain, place yourself into a space in radius; if you do, **Next turn:**
You are immune to enemy attack actions.

name: Cloak and Daggers
text: After you perform a basic action, you may repeat it once; if you repeat an attack action, you cannot target the same unit.

name: Hit and Run
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 space.

name: Light-Fingered
text:
You may move 1 space.
Take 1 coin from an enemy hero adjacent to you; if you do, you may move 1 space.

name: Sidestep
text:
Block a ranged attack.
You may move 1 space.

name: Combat Reflexes
text:
Before the attack: You may move 1 space.
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If you did not move before the attack, you may move 1 space.

name: Pick Pocket
text:
Move up to 2 spaces.
Take 1 coin from an enemy hero adjacent to you; if you do, you may move 1 space.

name: Parry
text:
Block a non-ranged attack.
The attacker discards a card, if able.

name: Backstab
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you; if a friendly unit is adjacent to the target, +2 ::attack_red:: Attack.
_(A “friendly unit” is another hero or a minion on your team.)_

name: Poisoned Dagger
text:
Give a hero in range a ::marker_poison:: poison marker.
The hero with a poison marker has -1 ::initiative:: Initiative, -1 ::attack_silver:: Attack, and -1 ::defense_silver:: Defense.

name: Evade
text:
Block a ranged attack.
You may move 1 space. You may retrieve your resolved or discarded basic skill card.

name: Leaping Strike
text:
Before the attack: You may move 1 space.
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 space.

name: Master Thief
text:
Move up to 2 spaces.  Take 1 or 2 coins from an enemy hero adjacent to you;
if you do, you may move up to 2 spaces.

name: Riposte
text: Block a non-ranged attack. The attacker discards a card, or is defeated.

name: Backstab with a Ballista
text:
Target a unit in range;
if a friendly unit is adjacent to the target +2 ::attack_red:: Attack, and the target cannot perform a primary action to defend.

name: Poisoned Dart
text:
Give a hero in range a ::marker_poison:: poison marker.
The hero with a poison marker has -2 ::initiative:: Initiative, -2 ::attack_silver:: Attack, and -2 ::defense_silver:: Defense.
